name: Scion of Sacrifice
text: The core of your values and the code you follow are rooted in your willingness to give your life for a greater purpose. Your body and soul are strong, and you do not shrink from giving up some of that strength to help others. You strike out with divine fury that racks you with pain but imbues you with even greater strength. You measure your worth by the foes you defeat.

features.devastatingAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to make an attack, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Charisma modifier
features.unflinchingPersistence(11thLevel): You gain an additional use of ardent vow each day
features.martyrâ€™sStrike(16thLevel): When an attack reduces you to 0 hit points or fewer, you can use an at-will attack power as a free action before falling unconscious

flavorText: Your threats are meaningless to me. Nothing you say can save you from death at my hands.
